name: 黃聲東
objective: 介紹單位換算與有效數位，元素的原子結構、化學方程式平衡與計算，反應熱，氣體與氣體定律，大氣層與環境污染，週期表，化學鍵，化合物的分子結構，熱力學，動力學，反應機構，平衡常數，氧化與還原，酸鹼反應，電化學，混合物的分離及現代科技材料，奠定良好化學基礎。
schedule:
Weeks	Dates	         Content
1	9/14, 9/15	Chapter 1 Introduction 
2	9/21, 9/22	Chapter 2 Atoms, Molecules, and Ions
3	9/28, 9/29	Chapter 3 Stoichiometry
4	10/5, 10/6	Chapter 4 Types of Chemical Reactions and 
                                     Solution Chemistry
5	18/12, 10/13	Chapter 5 Gases
6	10/19, 10/20	Chapter 5 Gases
7	10/26             Exam I (Chapter 2-5)
         10/27	         Chapter 6 Chemical Equilibrium
8	11/2, 11/3	Chapter 6 Chemical Equilibrium
9	119, 11/10	Chapter 7 Acid and Base
10	11/16, 11/17	Chapter 7 Acid and Base
11	11/23, 11/24	Chapter 8 Applications of Aqueous 
                                      Equilibria
12	11/30, 12/1	Chapter 8 Applications of Aqueous 
                                     Equilibria
13	12/7               Exam I (Chapter 2-5)
         12/8	          Chapter 9 Energy, Enthalpy, and 
                                      Thermochemistry
14	12/14, 12/15	Chapter 9 Energy, Enthalpy, and 
                                      Thermochemistry
15	12/21, 12/22	Chapter 10 Spontaneity, Entropy, and Free 
                                       Energy
16	12/28, 12/29	Chapter 10 Spontaneity, Entropy, and Free 
                                      Energy
17	1/4, 1/5	         Chapter 11 Electrochemistry
18	1/12	         Exam III (Chapter 9 to 11)
materials:
Zumdahl, Steven S. 
Chemical Principles; Sixth Edition
Houghton Mifflin Company
